channel.title: Compiler Code - not that hard :D
channel.description:
can somone post his compiler code here i deleted mine by accident end i dont know that code out of mine head :D
just go to your server -> compiler -> rightclick -> open in note pad -> past your code here
PLEAS dont add one where you can look tv on end that crap
just one that compiles no auto saving option or something i think thats just a wast of time :)

item.title: Compiler Code - not that hard :D
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

@echo off
title  Compiler
javac *.java -Xstdout errorLog.log
pause

Outputs errors to a log.

Note: Check errorLog.log for your errors, NOT the command prompt.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler Code - not that hard :D
item.dc:creator: @supra_s supra s
item.description:
@supra_s wrote:

[quote=“M00 M00 Pk, post:5, topic:234121”]@echo off COLOR 09 title Compiler javac *.java pause

Its called ‘Search’ :P[/quote]

i am srry i was to lazy

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler Code - not that hard :D
item.dc:creator: @supra_s supra s
item.description:
@supra_s wrote:

[quote=“DePredaTe, post:2, topic:234121”] @echo off COLOR 09 title DePredaTe's Compile/Run server. echo Please wait as your server is being compiled "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_14\bin\javac.exe" *.java echo Starting server! java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server tskill java pause

Alright, you need to change the file link. And, this will COMPILE, and RUN your server. Sorry, this is the only thing i use.[/quote]

@echo off
echo MafiaWorld3D - Compiling now.
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" *.java
pause

thx i thaked out the only things that are important for compiling

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler Code - not that hard :D
item.dc:creator: @stormcutter stormcutter
item.description:
@stormcutter wrote:

Here you go.

This will work with any java you have.

@echo off title Compiler javac *.java pause

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler Code - not that hard :D
item.dc:creator: @DePredaTe DePredaTe
item.description:
@DePredaTe wrote:

@echo off
COLOR 09
title DePredaTe's Compile/Run server.
echo Please wait as your server is being compiled
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_14\bin\javac.exe" *.java
echo Starting server!
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
tskill java
pause

Alright, you need to change the file link. And, this will COMPILE, and RUN your server. Sorry, this is the only thing i use.

Read full topic
